title: Luxury Studio with Floor-Ceiling Windows, pool and parking on site
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Luxury Studio with Floor-Ceiling Windows and Steps to the El! Gold Coast Studio with On-Site Grocery Store. Heat and A/C is included! Unit Features Great views and a modern kitchen with a built-in microwave! Close to EL and Bus Lines. Near Restaurants, Shopping, Entertainment! Garage Parking Available. Building Features: Heated Swimming Pool, Sundeck, Fitness Center, Valet Dry Cleaners, On-site Laundry. Prices are subject to change.***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #75433
